dcterms:creator: P. Sen
Galileo Namata
M. Bilgic
L. Getoor
B. Gallagher
T. Eliassi-Rad
dcterms:description: Cora is a citation network dataset for transductive learning setting. It contains one single large graph with 2, 708 papers from 7 areas. Each node has a 1433-dim attribution vector, and a total number of 5, 429 citation links exist in that graph. In this dataset, class distributions are relatively balanced, so we use an imitative imbalanced setting: three random classes are selected as minority classes and down-sampled.
dcterms:title: Cora

dcterms:creator: Lei Tang
Huan Liu
dcterms:description: BlogCatalog is a social network dataset crawled from BlogCatalog, with 10, 312 bloggers from 38 classes and 333, 983 friendship edges. The dataset doesnâ€™t contain node attributes. Classes in this dataset follow a genuine imbalanced distribution, with 14 classes smaller than 100, and 8 classes larger than 500.
dcterms:title: BlogCatalog

dcterms:creator: Mohammadreza Mohammadrezaei
Mohammad Ebrahim Shiri
Amir Masoud Rahmani
dcterms:description: Twitter dataset is crawled from Twitter on bot infestation problem. It has 5, 384, 160 users in total, among them, 63, 167 users are bots. This dataset is used for binary classification, and the imbalance ratio is roughly 1 : 30.
dcterms:title: Twitter
